com.conceptwave.scripting
Class CatalogAttributeAssociation

com.conceptwave.scripting.Object
  com.conceptwave.scripting.CWScriptable
      com.conceptwave.scripting.CatalogAttributeAssociation
Direct Known Subclasses:
CatalogItemAttribute
public class CatalogAttributeAssociation
extends CWScriptable

The APIs described below applies for CatalogItemAttribute and CatalogChargeTypeAttribute. An attribute association of another object. For each catalog object which will contains attribute association, it will extend this object The attribute association has code which is Java identifier no longer than 32 characters where the first character cannot be dollar sign or underscore. It maintains pointer to a data type definition and list of restrictions. The attributes in the list which are not properties are numbered starting from 0. The numbering is used in order to create the corresponding Order item dynamic documents in memory but does not need to be persisted between the Catalog starts.

Constructor Detail

CatalogAttributeAssociation

public CatalogAttributeAssociation()
Method Detail

getAssociationType

public String getAssociationType()
Gets the association type code (e.g. "contains", "related", etc.) of this item attribute

Returns:
The association type code. Notes: In order for an association type to be available to the item attribute UI screen, the association type needs to have the Category as Item Attribute.

getDefaultValue

public String getDefaultValue()
Gets the default value of the item attribute

Returns:
The item attribute default value. In case of date data type, the date is returned as a string in XSD format. Catalog class provides APIs to convert between XSD and date object.

getItemAttributeLabel

public String getItemAttributeLabel(String lang)
Gets the label of this item attribute. The catalog default language will be used if language code is not provided.

Parameters:
lang - The language code
Returns:
The item attribute label.

getLabel

public String getLabel(String lang)
Used by the dynamic document form renderer. Returns the item attribute label if it exists. Returns item attribute code if label does not exist.

Parameters:
lang - The language code
Returns:
Returns the item attribute label if it exists. Returns item attribute code if label does not exist.

getName

public String getName()
Deprecated. This method returns the item attribute code instead of name. Replaced by accessing code property directly.

Gets the name of this item attribute

Returns:
The item attribute name

getRestrictions

public CwcAttributeRestriction[] getRestrictions()
Returns an array of attribute restrictions for the item attribute.

Returns:
An array of attribute restrictions.

getTypeCode

public String getTypeCode()
Gets the attribute type code for this item attribute. Item attribute is an association between item and attribute type object. The attribute type code is the code of the attribute type.

Returns:
The attribute type code

getTypeCodeTable

public String getTypeCodeTable()
Returns the code table code of the attribute type for this item attribute.

Returns:
The code table code of the attribute type. If it is not a code table type attribute, it will return null

getTypeLength

public com.conceptwave.scripting.Integer getTypeLength()
Gets the length of the attribute type for this item attribute.

Returns:
The length of the attribute type.

getTypePrecision

public com.conceptwave.scripting.Integer getTypePrecision()
Gets the precision of the attribute type for this item attribute.

Returns:
The precision of the attribute type.

getTypeType

public com.conceptwave.scripting.Integer getTypeType()
Gets the data type for this item attribute

Returns:
The item attribute data type, based on the data types defined in CwfDataType, as follows:
  • 0: Number
  • 3: String
  • 4: Boolean
  • 6: Date
  • 7: Code table

    • isProperty

    public com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean isProperty()
    Checks if the item attribute is a property.

    Returns:
    Returns true if the item attribute is a property. False otherwise.
